ul.li: For "background-size", initial is "auto", it applies to all elements, it is not inherited, and percentage values are defined in text.

body.h3: If statement above is correct, this h3 heading should have no image displayed (or repeated), despite the fact that there is an image included for this element. The rule applied is "h3 {background-size: 0; background-image: url(flagbg.gif)} ". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.h4: This h4 heading should have UA-default background size, since negative value is specified for background-size, and this is not allowed. Rule specified is "h4 {background-size: -20px; background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif);}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph..
